instruction: Patient has noticed swelling in ankles recently, possibly related to lisinopril. Blood pressure has been higher than usual, around 150/90. Patient sometimes forgets the evening dose of medication.

attributes.narrative: Patient has noticed swelling in ankles recently, possibly related to lisinopril. Blood pressure has been higher than usual, around 150/90. Patient sometimes forgets the evening dose of medication.

instruction: Hypertension: Blood pressure has been higher than usual, around 150/90.

attributes.narrative: The patient's hypertension is not well-controlled as indicated by the higher than usual blood pressure readings.
attributes.background: The patient's blood pressure has been higher than usual, around 150/90.

instruction: Review kidney function tests before making any changes to medication.

attributes.comment: Review kidney function tests before making any changes to medication.
